name: wondah-blocks/ultimate-about
title: Ultimate About Collection
description: A versatile about section with title, description, and image layouts

description.default: Together–the investors and partners of Investate–we are reinventing real estate investing end-to-end.

storyDescription.default: Our founder started because he wanted to make it easy for anyone to do what he does: make money by investing in real estate.

founderQuote.default: Our goal is to build a better financial system for the individual investor — one that is simpler, more reliable, lower cost and transparent.

teamDescription.default: Our team brings experience, innovation, and creativity to the real estate investing experience to ensure your plans are in good hands.

default.name: Mike Simorangkir
default.bio: Mike, MBA, has 15+ years of experience in commercial and mixed-use real property development.

default.name: Stanley George
default.bio: Gregory was a partner at Heenan Blaikie LLP until September 2008.

default.name: Eliza Baker
default.bio: Eliza, MBA, has 12+ years of experience in commercial and mixed-use real property development.

default.name: Sally Cruz
default.bio: Terence Chang, has 10+ years of real estate investing experience in both the Canadian and Asia Pacific markets.
